```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(here))
library(magrittr)
```

```{r regenerate, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# To be run manually
source(here("scripts", "contaminants.R"))
source(here("scripts", "contaminants_w_rnases.R"))
```


This repository contains the contaminants FASTA files I use for my peptide
searches.

## FASTA files

```{r, echo=FALSE}
metadata_files <- list.files("metadata")

cont_table <- lapply(here("metadata", metadata_files), function(x) {
  read.delim(here(x)) %>% 
    `names<-`(gsub(".", " ", names(.), fixed = TRUE))
}) %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(cont_table)
```
